Articles.Content:
So what workhorse mainstay crafts have you guys cooked up in the new 1.0 Career mode that you're proud of?

I've got a simple 3 seat rocket which has become the cornerstone of my space tourism launches, taking 2 tourists plus a pilot up to ~75,000km.

Craft file: K4 - Space Taxi

I've even tuned the parachute - all I have to do is turn on SAS then stage normally - she flies straight up and lands on her own with no further input.

I threw a flag down at the landing zone and it usually touches down within 100m of the flag!

my Saturn IB

and the might Saturn V. I pretty much launch everything with these rockets, I am currently working on something smaller for launching probes. Maybe an Atlas or an Arianne :-)

Kerbals are pretty expensiv in hard mode. but only every 10th one is a scienctist...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

It has 1k delta v once in orbit, that is more than enough to rendezvous with 4 pods in LKO. And even if no one of them is a scienctist, one can earn some money with it.
